title: Commission Structure
content:
Our commission structure is based on performance tiers:

• Tier 1 (0-$50k monthly): 8% commission
• Tier 2 ($50k-$100k monthly): 10% commission  
• Tier 3 ($100k+ monthly): 12% commission

Commissions are paid on the 15th of each month for the previous month's sales. All sales must be verified and completed to count toward commission calculations.

title: Lead Generation Best Practices
content:
Effective lead generation strategies:

• **Cold Outreach**: Research prospects thoroughly before reaching out
• **Social Media**: Use LinkedIn and industry forums to connect
• **Referrals**: Ask satisfied clients for referrals - they convert 3x better
• **Content Marketing**: Share valuable insights to attract prospects
• **Networking Events**: Attend industry conferences and local business meetups

Track all leads in our CRM system and follow up within 24 hours.

title: Expense Reimbursement Policy
content:
Reimbursable expenses for independent contractors:

**Approved Expenses:**
• Client meeting meals (up to $100 per meeting)
• Travel expenses for client visits (mileage at $0.65/mile)
• Professional development courses (pre-approved)
• Business phone/internet (50% reimbursement)

**Submission Process:**
1. Keep all receipts
2. Submit through expense portal by month-end
3. Include client name and meeting purpose
4. Reimbursement processed within 10 business days

title: CRM System Usage
content:
How to use our CRM effectively:

**Daily Tasks:**
• Log all client interactions within 2 hours
• Update deal stages after each conversation
• Set follow-up reminders for next actions

**Weekly Tasks:**
• Review pipeline and update forecasts
• Clean up old leads and mark status
• Generate activity reports

**Monthly Tasks:**
• Analyze conversion rates by source
• Update client contact information
• Archive completed deals

CRM login: portal.company.com (use your company email)

title: Common Objection Handling
content:
How to handle common sales objections:

**"It's too expensive"**
→ Focus on ROI and long-term value
→ Break down cost per month/day
→ Compare to cost of not solving the problem

**"We need to think about it"**
→ Ask what specific concerns they have
→ Address each concern directly
→ Create urgency with limited-time offers

**"We're happy with our current solution"**
→ Ask about current challenges
→ Highlight unique differentiators
→ Suggest a pilot program

**"Not the right time"**
→ Understand their timeline
→ Stay in touch with valuable content
→ Ask when would be better

title: New Contractor Onboarding
content:
Welcome! Here's your onboarding checklist:

**Week 1:**
□ Complete compliance training
□ Set up CRM access
□ Review product documentation
□ Schedule manager 1:1 meeting

**Week 2:**
□ Shadow experienced contractor
□ Practice product demos
□ Learn objection handling scripts
□ Set up expense tracking

**Week 3:**
□ First supervised client call
□ Review commission structure
□ Join team Slack channels
□ Complete first deal registration

**Ongoing:**
□ Weekly team meetings (Tuesdays 10am)
□ Monthly training sessions
□ Quarterly performance reviews
